languages.text:
Pasqal gains +{uip|DodgeParryReduction|ef6a2442104a4768b0ef26c8a66b1201}% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons.
If an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} his attack, the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled for the next melee attack against this enemy.
languages.original_text:
При использовании рукопашного оружия Паскаль получает +{uip|DodgeParryReduction|ef6a2442104a4768b0ef26c8a66b1201}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}снижению парирования{/g}.
Если противник {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от атаки или {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирует{/g} ее, при следующей атаке в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} против этой цели {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} удваивается.

traits.locale_text:
Pasqal gains +<u>(10 + 2 × INT bonus)<u>% to dodge reduction and parry reduction with melee weapons.
If an enemy dodges or parries his attack, the bonus is doubled for the next melee attack against this enemy.

Pasqal gains +{uip|DodgeParryReduction|ef6a2442104a4768b0ef26c8a66b1201}% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons.
If an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} his attack, the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled for the next melee attack against this enemy.

Pasqal gains +{uip|DodgeParryReduction|ef6a2442104a4768b0ef26c8a66b1201}% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} with melee weapons.
If an enemy dodges or parries his attack, the bonus is doubled for the next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g} against this enemy.

Pasqal gains +{uip|DodgeParryReduction|ef6a2442104a4768b0ef26c8a66b1201}% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons.
If an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} his attack, the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled for the next melee attack against this enemy.

languages.text:
Pasqal erlangt +{uip|DodgeParryReduction|ef6a2442104a4768b0ef26c8a66b1201} % auf die {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Parieren-Reduktion{/g} mit {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}-Waffen.
Sollte ein Feind seinem Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g} oder ihn {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g}, wird der {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} für den nächsten Nahkampfangriff gegen diesen Feind verdoppelt.
languages.original_text:
Pasqal gains +{uip|DodgeParryReduction|ef6a2442104a4768b0ef26c8a66b1201}% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons.
If an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} his attack, the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled for the next melee attack against this enemy.

traits.locale_text:
Pasqal erlangt +{uip|DodgeParryReduction|ef6a2442104a4768b0ef26c8a66b1201} % auf die {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Parieren-Reduktion{/g} mit Nahkampfwaffen.
Sollte ein Feind seinem Angriff ausweichen oder ihn parieren, wird der Bonus für den nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriff{/g} gegen diesen Feind verdoppelt.

Pasqal erlangt +<u>(10 + 2× {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> % auf die {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Parieren-Reduktion{/g} mit Nahkampfwaffen.
Sollte ein Feind seinem Angriff ausweichen oder ihn parieren, wird der Bonus für den nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriff{/g} gegen diesen Feind verdoppelt.

languages.text:
Pasqal obtient +{uip|DodgeParryReduction|ef6a2442104a4768b0ef26c8a66b1201} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}réduction de parade{/g} avec les armes de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}.
Si un ennemi {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pare{/g} son attaque, le {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} est doublé lors de l'attaque de mêlée suivante contre cet ennemi.

Pasqal obtient +{uip|DodgeParryReduction|ef6a2442104a4768b0ef26c8a66b1201} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}réduction de parade{/g} avec les armes de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}.
Si un ennemi {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pare{/g} son attaque, le {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} est doublé lors de l'attaque de mêlée suivante contre cet ennemi.

Pasqal obtient +{uip|DodgeParryReduction|ef6a2442104a4768b0ef26c8a66b1201} % en termes de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}réduction de parade{/g} avec les armes de mêlée.
Si un ennemi esquive ou pare son attaque, le bonus est doublé lors de l'{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaque de mêlée{/g} suivante contre cet ennemi.

languages.text:
当帕斯卡使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器时，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}招架减免{/g}提高{uip|DodgeParryReduction|ef6a2442104a4768b0ef26c8a66b1201}%。
如果有敌人{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}招架{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}闪避{/g}了他的攻击，则他下次近战攻击对该敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}翻倍。

Pasqal gains +{uip|DodgeParryReduction|ef6a2442104a4768b0ef26c8a66b1201}% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons.
If an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} his attack, the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled for the next melee attack against this enemy.

traits.locale_text:
当帕斯卡使用近战武器时，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}招架减免{/g}提高<u>（10+2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%。
如果有敌人招架或闪避了他的攻击，则他下次{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}对该敌人的加值翻倍。

当帕斯卡使用近战武器时，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}招架减免{/g}提高{uip|DodgeParryReduction|ef6a2442104a4768b0ef26c8a66b1201}%。
如果有敌人招架或闪避了他的攻击，则他下次{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}对该敌人的加值翻倍。

languages.original_text:
Pasqal gains +<u>(10 + 2 × INT bonus)<u>% to dodge reduction and parry reduction with melee weapons.
If an enemy dodges or parries his attack, the bonus is doubled for the next melee attack against this enemy.

languages.text:
Pasqal obtiene un +{uip|DodgeParryReduction|ef6a2442104a4768b0ef26c8a66b1201} % a la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} y a la {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}reducción de parada{/g} con armas {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}.
Si un enemigo {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}para{/g} su ataque, la {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} se duplica para el próximo ataque cuerpo a cuerpo contra ese enemigo.
languages.original_text:
Pasqal gains +{uip|DodgeParryReduction|ef6a2442104a4768b0ef26c8a66b1201}% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons.
If an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} his attack, the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled for the next melee attack against this enemy.

traits.locale_text:
Pasqal obtiene un +<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g})</u> % a la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} y a la {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}reducción de parada{/g} con armas cuerpo a cuerpo.
Si un enemigo esquiva o para su ataque, la bonificación se duplica para el próximo {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} contra ese enemigo.

Pasqal obtiene un +{uip|DodgeParryReduction|ef6a2442104a4768b0ef26c8a66b1201} % a la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} y a la {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}reducción de parada{/g} con armas cuerpo a cuerpo.
Si un enemigo esquiva o para su ataque, la bonificación se duplica para el próximo {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} contra ese enemigo.

languages.text:
При использовании рукопашного оружия Паскаль получает +{uip|DodgeParryReduction|ef6a2442104a4768b0ef26c8a66b1201}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}снижению парирования{/g}.
Если противник {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от атаки или {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирует{/g} ее, при следующей атаке в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} против этой цели {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} удваивается.
languages.original_text:
Pasqal gains +{uip|DodgeParryReduction|ef6a2442104a4768b0ef26c8a66b1201}% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons.
If an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} his attack, the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled for the next melee attack against this enemy.

traits.locale_text:
При использовании рукопашного оружия Паскаль получает +<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}ИНТ{/g})</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}снижению парирования{/g}.
Если противник уклоняется от атаки или парирует ее, при следующей {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атаке в ближнем бою{/g} против этой цели бонус удваивается.

При использовании рукопашного оружия Паскаль получает +<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}ИНТ{/g})</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}снижению парирования{/g}.
Если противник уклоняется от атаки или парирует ее, при следующей {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атаке в ближнем бою{/g} против этой цели бонус удваивается.

При использовании рукопашного оружия Паскаль получает +{uip|DodgeParryReduction|ef6a2442104a4768b0ef26c8a66b1201}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}снижению парирования{/g}.
Если противник уклоняется от атаки или парирует ее, при следующей {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атаке в ближнем бою{/g} против этой цели бонус удваивается.

languages.text:
パスカルは{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}攻撃によって{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}および{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}受け流し減少{/g}が<u>（10+2×INTボーナス）</u>+{uip|DodgeParryReduction|ef6a2442104a4768b0ef26c8a66b1201}%増加する。
敵が攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流す{/g}と、その敵に対する次の近接攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}は2倍になる。
languages.original_text:
Pasqal gains +{uip|DodgeParryReduction|ef6a2442104a4768b0ef26c8a66b1201}% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons.
If an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} his attack, the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled for the next melee attack against this enemy.

traits.locale_text:
パスカルは近接攻撃によって{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}および{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}受け流し減少{/g}が<u>(10+2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>％増加する。
敵が攻撃を回避または受け流すと、その敵に対する次の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}のボーナスは2倍になる。

パスカルは近接攻撃により{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}および{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}受け流し減少{/g}が{uip|DodgeParryReduction|ef6a2442104a4768b0ef26c8a66b1201}%増加する。
敵が攻撃を回避または受け流すと、その敵に対する次の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}のボーナスは2倍になる。

languages.text:
Pasqal, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} silahlarıyla yapacağı saldırılarda {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}kaçınma azaltımı{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}savuşturma azaltımı{/g} değerlerine +%{uip|DodgeParryReduction|ef6a2442104a4768b0ef26c8a66b1201} kazanır.
Bir düşman bu saldırıdan {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınır{/g} veya onu {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturursa{/g} aynı düşmana yapılacak bir sonraki yakın dövüş saldırısında bu {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} ikiye katlanır.
languages.original_text:
Pasqal gains +{uip|DodgeParryReduction|ef6a2442104a4768b0ef26c8a66b1201}% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons.
If an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} his attack, the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled for the next melee attack against this enemy.
